title: Ticket #279: Handle history files over 2GB
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

This mainly deals with the markers that we put in history files to support scanning them backwards. I'm not sure if we currently otherwise support large history files or not.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (28).
derived_tickets: #785   improve flat-file condor_history performance
creator: gquinn
